channel.title: How do i change the ip on my 317 server or client?
channel.description: how i change ip for my server or client because i want other's to play and i did everything else right so i think thats only thing thats not letting them play from other places with my client.

item.title: How do i change the ip on my 317 server or client?
item.dc:creator: @i_str_pk_i i str pk i
item.description:
@i_str_pk_i wrote:

[quote=“mr pker01, post:2, topic:392486”]Go client.java then search for “Server =”

then replace the numbers/ip address with urs :D[/quote]LOL actualy i didn’t founded it in my new client but now i did ! TY

Read full topic
